title: userconfigured
extract: IT to arrange the way in which something, such as a computer system or software, is organized, so that it can be used for a particular task: All too often, office workers have computers on their desks, but the machines aren't configured to permit easy data sharing.
extract_html: IT to arrange the way in which something, such as a computer system or software, is organized, so that it can be used for a particular task: All too often, office workers have computers on their desks, but the machines aren't configured to permit easy data sharing.
